```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(purrr)
walk(repro:::yamls_packages(), function(x)safely(library)(x, character.only = TRUE))
```

```{r}
met <- function(x, ...){
  sessioninfo:::print.session_info(x, ..)
  cat("\n\U0009")
}
.S3method("print", "session_info", met)
```

```{r}
session_info()
```
